title: Linux umask Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux umask command and learn how to modify file and directory permissions effectively. Discover practical examples to apply umask in various scenarios.

meta.description: Explore the Linux umask command and learn how to modify file and directory permissions effectively. Discover practical examples to apply umask in various scenarios.

verify.name: Verify the current umask value
verify.hint: The current umask value should be 0022. Please check the output of the `umask` command.

steps.title: Modifying File and Directory Permissions with umask

verify.name: Verify the permissions of new files and directories
verify.hint: The permissions of the new file should be -rw-rw-r-- and the permissions of the new directory should be drwxrwxr-x.

verify.name: Verify the permissions of the sensitive file
verify.hint: The permissions of the sensitive file should be -rw-------. Please check the output of the `ls -l` command.

verify.name: Verify the permissions of the shared directory and file
verify.hint: The permissions of the shared directory should be drwxrwx--- and the permissions of the shared file should be -rw-rw----. Please check the output of the `ls -l` command.
